info.name: Flowing Mist - 183 chars
info.description:
This was inspired by public_int_i's shader:
[url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view/lssBWH[/url]
I was going for a 3D tornado vortex effect, but this is what I got.
I think if I play with the offsets in the rotation matrix, I can create volumetric tornado.

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(o,U)				\
vec2 u = U / iResolution.x - .4;	\
for (float i = 1.; i < 4.; i += .1)	\
o += .02*texture( iChannel0, i+mat2(cos(.03*iTime + .8*vec4(6,0,0,2)))*fract(.5+.1*vec2(u.x,1)/(u.y-=.02)))* -u.y*6.
renderpass.name: Image
